mapper.update: update ts_student set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political = #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_year = #{entryYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_no = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select student_no, student_name, password, gender, birth, class_id, political, dept_id, entry_year from ts_student where student_no = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select student_no, student_name, password, gender, birth, class_id, political, dept_id, entry_year from ts_student
